ygData.subject: New Cleric heal spell idea.....
ygData.msgSnippet: I think once they come out with the add-on and give us new lvls and new spells one cool idea for a heal spell is....... A spell you cast say before you fight
ygData.messageBody:
I think once they come out with the add-on and give us new lvls and new
spells one cool idea for a heal spell is....... A spell you cast say before
you fight and it works like the Bards heal song and heals you a little over
time. Have a icon the shows up like any buffs you have on a stay for 5-10
mins. Maybe later do a group heal spell like this one. I'm not saying to
have to heal us or someone says a lot but just a little over time, maybe
have a few, (depends on how many lvls they give us), and say the first one
does 5 heal points so many secs, the next one does 20 every so many secs.
Just an idea. What do you all think on that idea?

***************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 20 Human Cleric of The Rathe
***************************
